rules_text:
Kicker {1}{W} and/or {1}{B} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{W} and/or {1}{B} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
If Semkavolver was kicked with its {1}{W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and has flying.
If Semkavolver was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, when it enters the battlefield, target opponent sacrifices a creature.
